subject: Problème with shipping
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi MW2game0,    Here is your logistics tracking link. The pedal has been shipped, but due to recent warehouse overload, the VAM Pro has not yet been dispatched. We will ship it to you as soon as possible.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047110521693,SF6047110522096

Ok, thank you.

Le jeu. 4 déc. 2025 à 09:54, service@simsonn.com
